Working in the Revision Pane

Use the Revision pane to view the revision details of a versioned file. To open the Revision pane, select View | Show Revisions or click the Show Revisions tool bar icon. The Revision pane changes dynamically to reflect the information specific to the selected versioned file. Depending on the versioned file, the Revision pane can display up to three tabs:

  • Revisions tab
  • Version Labels tab
  • Promotion Groups tab

Revisions are represented by the following icons:

A revision.
A locked revision.
A revision assigned a promotion group.
A locked revision assigned a promotion group.
A revision assigned a version label.
A locked revision assigned a version label.
A locked revision assigned a version label and a promotion group.
Trunk (the main line of development).
A branch.

From the Revision pane, you can:

  • Click a branch to review information about branch revisions.
  • Click the Revisions, Version Labels, or Promotion Groups tab to view different types of information about the revision.
  • Click a column header to sort the files in ascending order in the column.
  • Click a sort order button to change the sort order from ascending to descending order.
  • Right-click a revision, version label, or promotion group to access a context menu, which provides quick access to frequently used functions.
  • Resize the width of the fields displayed on each tab.
  • Resize the width or height of the Revision pane.
  • Scroll horizontally or vertically.
